data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Francisco, Bárbara Cristina S., Pinto, Roberta R., Fernandes, Daniel S. (2012): Taxonomy of Epictia munoai (Orejas-Miranda, 1961) (Squamata: Serpentes: Leptotyphlopidae). Zootaxa 3512: 42-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282518
